DOC.brief_summary: To Determine if topical cyclosporine 0.05% BID prevents recurrent inflammation and improves comfort in eyes with pterygia.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Topical Cyclosporine 0.05% in the Prevention of Ocular Surface Inflammation Secondary to Pterygia
DOC.criteria: pts with symptomatic pterygia unresponsive to palliative treatment.
